text: Pheidole spathifera is a species of ant in the subfamily Myrmicinae. It is found in Asian countries. ==Subspecies== *Pheidole spathifera aspatha Forel, 1902 \- India *Pheidole spathifera spathifera Forel, 1902 \- Bangladesh, India, Thailand, China *Pheidole spathifera yerburyi Forel, 1902 \- Myanmar, Sri Lanka ==References== ==External links== * * at antwiki.org *Animaldiversity.org *Itis.org spathifera Category:Hymenoptera of Asia Category:Insects described in 1902
title: Pheidole spathifera
